title: The Best Summer Dresses on Amazon—Vetted by ELLE Editors
description: From linen midis to beach-ready minis, these are the styles that passed our fashion editor test.
excerpt: Shop ELLE editors' picks for the best summer dresses on Amazon, including
text: The One-and-Done OutfitMadewell Poplin Smocked Maxi Dress“An easy ruched dress like this option from Madewell will never steer you wrong. It makes an easy, one-second outfit feel like an elevated choice for the day. And for under $150, I’m sold.”—Dale Arden Chong, senior fashion commerce editorThe Summer StapleNIA Santal Dress“NIA’s Santal Dress is a cult favorite that’s perpetually sold out for a reason. html:
The One-and-Done Outfit

Madewell Poplin Smocked Maxi Dress

“An easy ruched dress like this option from Madewell will never steer you wrong. It makes an easy, one-second outfit feel like an elevated choice for the day. And for under $150, I’m sold.”—Dale Arden Chong, senior fashion commerce editor

The Summer Staple

NIA Santal Dress

“NIA’s Santal Dress is a cult favorite that’s perpetually sold out for a reason. Made from a lightweight jersey fabric with a flattering ruched bodice, and yes, pockets, it pays for itself in cost-per-wear alone.”—Claire Stern Milch, digital director

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Chic Cover-Up

Frame The Bauble Dress

“Preppy chic meets the beach in this polo dress that can easily be worn as a swimsuit cover-up.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

The Wedding Guest Hero

Lioness Field of Dreams Maxi Dress

If your calendar is filled with weddings this summer, add this pastel number to your wardrobe lineup.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The City Dress

Sea Cassandra Print Ruched Dress

We love a dress that can go the extra mile. This one will stun at any summer festivity and it can be worn to the office for a chic workwear update.

The Vacation Dress

Nia Cabaello Dress

“When I’m last-minute shopping for a trip, I like to look for easy dresses that I can throw on and not think too much about. This one is perfect.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Carrie Bradshaw Dress

Norma Kamali Diana Gown

Once ELLE editors spotted Sarah Jessica Parker wearing this elegantly draped Norma Kamali Diana Gown while filming season 3 of And Just Like That, it went straight into our Amazon carts.

The Beach Dress

Seven Wonders Calli Mini Dress

“I like to bring a bit of fun with me on beach days. Luckily, this dress comes with a playful print that matches the energy of the summer.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Comfortable Maxi

Jenni Kayne Cove Dress

Breezy cotton maxi dresses, like this Jenni Kayne number, are the first thing to reach for during a heatwave.

The Party Dress

Arianne Elmy Refresh Good Luck Dress, Refresh

With floral embroidery, this is the dress to wear to all of those special plans on the calendar.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Accessory Accompaniment

Staud Vincent Dress

The Vacation Dress

Anine Bing Arie Dress

We can’t get enough of Anine Bing’s effortlessly chic styles on Amazon, including this striped knit dress that would look great on vacation.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Drop-Waist Dress

Simkhai Allana Midi Dress

“Drop-waist dresses are a must-have this summer, and this one comes in an on-trend butter yellow hue.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

The Summer Work Outfit

Vince Furrow Stripe Wrap Dress

Here’s a striped shirtdress from Vince that has summer office outfit written all over it. But styled with flip-flops and a raffia bag, it would be well-suited for weekend brunch.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Denim Option

Levi’s Louisa Denim Short Sleeve Dress

There aren’t too many things as timeless as Levi’s denim, especially classic styles like this shirtdress.

The Pretty Pleats

Ulla Johnson Delmara Dress

We love versatility. ELLE editors appreciate this one for its ability to stun during any occasion.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Casual Option

Frank & Eileen Perfect Tee Dress

Frank & Eileen’s ultra-versatile T-shirt dress turns a quick grocery store run (or takeout pick-up) into a stylish outing.

The Compliment Earner

Suillty Tie Dye Tank Dress

“I bought this $25 tank dress a few years ago, and it’s been scoring compliments ever since. Seriously, I’ve reached for this on so many occasions where I didn’t know what else to wear—and it’s always a good choice.”—Meg Donohue, associate fashion commerce editor

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Why trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
